tool_description: An API used to returns the information about a specific movie
name: Movie Details
title: Movie Details

api_list.name: Movie ID
api_list.description: The YTS ID of the movie or the IMDB ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://movie-details3.p.rapidapi.com/movie_details.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movie-details3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://movie-details3.p.rapidapi.com/movie_details.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movie-details3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
